summary: WHEN ATTEMPTING TO MAKE A LEFT HAND TURN , THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED AND ALMOST HIT A CURVE.   *AK   THE CONSUMER THEN PLACED THE VEHICLE IN REVERSE 2-3 TIMES.  (IN THE MIDDLE OF TRAFFIC & BUSY INTERSECTION)  THE FOLLOWING DAY, THE INCIDENT RECURRED WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS DRIVING TO THE DEALER.  THERE HAD BEEN NO ACCIDENTS WITH THIS VEHICLE, BUT THE SUB FRAME RACK & PINION HAD BROKEN APART.  ONE SIDE HAD BEEN BROKEN FOR A WHILE AND STARTED TO RUST.  (LOOKED LIKE POOR WELDING/MANUFACTURER DEFECT)  *SCC   *JB
